title: Insecure FTP Access
description: A file server has been exposed to the internet with a misconfigured FTP server allowing anonymous access. Exploit this configuration to retrieve sensitive data.
hints: Try connecting to the FTP server using anonymous login.
Look for any files that might contain sensitive information.
Remember to download the file once you find it.
learningObjectives: Understand FTP service configuration and common vulnerabilities
Identify misconfigurations leading to information exposure
Practice using FTP client tools to navigate and retrieve files
